titles.title: In Quietness And Confidence Shall Be Thy Strength

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In quietness and confidence shall be thy strength.
In quietness and confidence shall be thy strength.
When I give thee quietness, who shall disturb thee?
In quietness and confidence shall be thy strength.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The work of righteousness shall be thy peace
The effect of righteousness, quiet assurance
My people shall dwell in a peaceful habitation
In quietness and confidence shall be thy strength.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take heed, be quiet and fear no more
For thou art My people and I am Thy God
Rest in the Lord and wait upon Me;
In quietness and confidence shall be thy strength.
